msContents.summary: A list of names of delinquent taxpayers

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso contains an account

condition.ab: This light-brown is in a good state of conservation. Regularly cut at all sides except at the top. Abrasions only significant in the left margin, which means that no text is lost. Seven vertical folds visible.

handDesc.p: Written in a regular semicursive sloping slightly to the right.

origin.origPlace: Philadelphia, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Nemeion, collector of the laographia in Philadelphia
Nero Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus Autokrator, emperor
Sambas alias Ischeis, son of Ischeis
Phasis, son of Phasis, the son

provenance.p: Philadelphia, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt (?)

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: "From Nemeion, collector of the laographia in Philadelphia. Due for Epeiph of the 2nd year of Nero Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus Autokrator, emperor, are the unpaid taxes of the first year.;;Herakles, son of Pouris, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Horos, son of Pnepheros, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Phasis, son of Hatres, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Phasis, a son, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Petesouchos, son of Ischeis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Sambas alias Ischeis, son of Ischeis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Phasis, son of another Phasis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Phasis, son of Phasis, the son, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Polyphantes, son of Polyphantes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Horos, son of Apollonios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Petermotes, son of Peseris, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Harphaesis, son of Harphaesis, 45 dracmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi;Pylades, son of Herakleas, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pemsas, Haryotes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pankrates, son of Haryotes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pebos, son of Herakleas, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Herakles, son of Pebos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Herakles, son of another Pebos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi.;;Col. II;;Kallis, son of Harphaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Another Kallis, son of Harpaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Harphaesis, son of Mysthes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Herakles, son of Petesouchos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Teos, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Peinaus, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Sambas, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pachnoubis, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Apynchis, son of Horos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Horos, son of Abis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pete(mounis?), son of Akousilaos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Peteouchos, son of Petesouchos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Zoilos, son of Thyon, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Hatres, son of Kephalon, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Peeris, son of Ptollis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Petouchos, son of Panoubis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Praxias, son of Harpaesis, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Herakles, son of Herakles, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Sambas, son of Aropos, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Horion, son of Horion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Satabous, son of Horion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Ptollis, son of Dios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Dios, son of Dios, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Pomes, son of Pomes, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi,;Protion, Praxion, 45 drachmas 1 diobolon, dike-tax 2 drachmas 6 tetraboloi."

listBibl.bibl: Westermann WL - Kraemer CJ, PCorn, 24, 1926 -- BL VI, 32; BL III, 46 on ll. 1, 8, 11, 16 , 20 and 34; BL VII, 40.
